name: Caravan Chaos
description:
Local and Online Multiplayer Chaos!
Swing and swerve with your caravan and then launch it at your opponents for maximum damage! In Caravan Chaos you compete in frantic and entertaining matches with up to 3 other players.



Chaotic Gamemodes
All out physics-based vehicular combat!
Wreck everyone and be the last one alive in Last Van Standing, dribble past your opponents and score satisfying longshots in Soccer and don't get caught with the explosive caravan when it detonates in Hot Potato!



Simple Controls
Only one stick and one button are needed to start wrecking. The controls are easy to grasp, but there is still mastery in perfecting blocking incoming shots or building up maximum momentum for that devastating shot.
We also offer two control schemas so that you can play how you like it best.

Crazy Caravan Classes
Choose between over ten different classes and find the one that suits your playstyle! With classic caravans, giant rubber ducks or unicorn-hovercrafts there is a class just for you.
